title: Becoming a Better Angular Developer: Tips for Growth and Success
content: In the ever-evolving realm of web development, it's important for Angular developers to keep growing and getting better. By improving your skills and following best practices, you can become a stronger Angular developer and achieve great results.

Having attended many Angular interviews, I've noticed some areas where candidates often struggle. So, I'll explore some key areas that can help you level up your Angular development skills. Let's dive in!
âœ” Master Typescript: Understand the benefits of Typescript for improved code quality and management.
âœ” Harness the Power of RxJS: Learn how to use Observables, Operators, and Subjects for efficient handling of asynchronous operations.
âœ” Embrace Testing and Debugging: Familiarize yourself with testing frameworks like Jasmine, Karma and cypress, and develop strong debugging skills.

âœ” Manage Memory: To avoid memory leaks and optimize application performance, ensure that you unsubscribe from events when they are no longer needed, Clean Up Event Listeners, Avoid Circular References, and Use OnPush Change Detection Strategy.
